sentences.en: A bill of exchange is a legally recognized document.
Footnotes have been appended to the document.
He asked me to make ten copies of the document.
sentences.cn: 他叫我把这份文件复印十份.

sentences.en: He had been sitting on the document for at least two months.
sentences.cn: 他已经将这份文件压了至少两个月。

sentences.en: He rummaged around the post room and found the document.
sentences.cn: 他翻遍了收发室，找到了那份文件。

sentences.en: He says the new document will guar-antee fairness for blacks in Georgia.
sentences.cn: 他说这个新文件将保证佐治亚州的黑人受到公平对待。

sentences.en: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
sentences.cn: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

sentences.en: It was an abbreviated document without detailed proposals.
sentences.cn: 这是一份省去了建议细节的文件简本。

sentences.en: Press Exit to return to your document.
She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.cn: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

sentences.en: The doctoring of the document has become a live political issue.
sentences.cn: 对文件的篡改伪造已成为当下让人关注的政治问题。

sentences.en: The document is expressed in terms that are readily understood and agreed.
sentences.cn: 文件用语浅显易懂，让人易于接受。

sentences.en: The document provided a springboard for a lot of useful discussion.
sentences.cn: 这份文件引发出许多有益的讨论。

sentences.en: The document was duly signed by the inspector.
sentences.cn: 这份文件已由检查员签妥。

sentences.en: To close your document, press CTRL+W on your keyboard.
sentences.cn: 关闭文件时要同时按键盘上的CTRL键和W键。

sentences.en: You can individualize a document by adding comments in the margins.
sentences.cn: 你可以在页边空白处添加评论使文件变得富有个性。

words.tran_cn: 文件，公文；[计]文档；[管理]证件

phrases.tran_cn: 身份证件；身分证明文件
原始文件；[计]源文献；正本单据

trans.tran_en: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it
